description: Jesse Bernheim, Attorney at Law, in Jacksonville, Florida, provides exceptional representation to clients across his region who suffered a serious injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions. With an additional office in Starke, his law firm has grown into one of Florida's leading personal injury practices, and he promises to fight hard to protect your rights and entitlements and to increase your chances of obtaining the justice you deserve...
